ctu_text: ", "briefDescription": "“Mukhyamantri Mahalaxmi Kit Yojana” is a social security scheme by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development, Government of Uttarakhand, that aims to provide nutritional kits to the postpartum mothers and their daughters. ", "exclusions_md": "", "detailedDescription": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Launched by the Department of Women Empowerment and Child Development in Uttarakhand, the "Mukhyamantri Mahalaxmi Kit Yojana" is a social security scheme offering a helping hand to new mothers and their daughters. This initiative specifically targets mothers with a family income below a certain limit. By providing essential nutritional kits, the program aims to improve the health and well-being of both mothers and their newborn daughters during the crucial postpartum period.
